title: Smoky Black Bean and Hemp Burgers
directions: Start of by mixing the ground flax meal and water in a small bowl. Set aside
Place black beans in a food processor and pulse. You want some chunks here but a good mash is what we are looking for.
Add black beans to a mixing bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients. *
Form into 4 big patties and place on plate.

Heat up a medium skillet and spray liberally with cooking spray. Place patties in pan and cook about 5 minutes each side. You want a nice crisp on the outside and also make sure that they are heated thru.
Serve with your favorite bun and add any toppings you like. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. chickpea flour (or any flour will do)
